website_summaries.verdict: If you love Santa and sequins, this sweater is for you. With several bright colors to choose from, you can customize your look.
pros: Features vibrant Santa faces on top of soft, "feathery" materials
Santa's hats have shiny sequins that add a bit of cuteness to this sweater
cons: The neckline is wide, and has the tendency to stretch even wider with repeated wear and washings

customer_reviews.title: Dabbing Santa!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a XL and it fit just like an XL. The colors are exactly as pictured. The material is soft. The sequins grab if you rub your arm sleeve but that is a weird position so I don't really do that often. Other than when I am dabbing. It is a medium weight sweater. I really enjoyed wearing it and got lots of compliments. It is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Cutes reindeer sweater
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is very cute, washes well, doesn't shrink, fits well and is different than anything else I've seen. Got plenty of compliments. I do recommend washing it inside out to preserve the sequin. Also, be mindful that then neck cut out is a bit deeper than usual so you need either a white turtle neck underneath or a tank top that doesn't show straps.
customer_reviews.author: AGirlLikesSnow

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: i purchased for an ugly sweater contest. I won 2 times! It was actually very comfortable and much softer than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for ugly sweater party at work. Order up two sizes for a perfect fit. It keeps you very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye catcher
customer_reviews.text: It’s really too pretty to be an ugly Christmas sweater !! Fits well and looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Kathy d

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than usual and it was still kind of tight and is short only goes to waist.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sue Kuehle

customer_reviews.title: Late review, but better late than never.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last minute for an ugly Christmas sweater party I would be attending. I was a little leery about the sizing but it turned out to be a perfect fit from the size chart provided. Cute "ugly" sweater for a good price. Will definitely look into this company again for the next holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a ugly xmas sweater for work & this one was inexpensive enough to work. Fit nicely, with a little wiggle room. It's really warm, too.

customer_reviews.title: Love the black sweater with sequin deer!
customer_reviews.text: Way too cute in person!!!! Has shiny blue thread mixed with black making it sparkly

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an ugly sweater party. That being said it is Cute, I got a lot of compliments. But everyone said it not an ugly sweater!

customer_reviews.title: Its not a ugly xmas sweater at all. It's more a  nice looking sweater
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice design on the front of the sweater. It's a cute Christmas sweater and very warm

customer_reviews.title: A wee bit short.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice ugly sweater. I bought the X-small for my wife, which fit pretty well, but the length was a little short. The collar is wide and in conjunction with the short length it works better with a light under garment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Yes this was an ugly sweater
customer_reviews.text: Every holiday sweater is ugly in my opinion but this one didn't win the holiday party contest. How could it when there are so many to choose from. Nice quality sweater, too bad it's ugly!

customer_reviews.title: Short Torso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Soft Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for ugly sweater day for daughter at school, certainly not ugly! Previous comments mentioned sizing small as it was purchased for daughter it was a little big, but will last. Really cute and extremely soft on skin, would highly recommend this vendor to others.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great looking Ugly Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking Ugly Christmas Sweater. I would actually wear it out and about during the Holiday Season. Nice quality and a good fit.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The Black has a slight blue sparkle in the thread and it’s adorable. The reindeer is good quality sequin and doesn’t shed. So many compliments when I wore it! Fits nicely. I run between a small and medium and went with the medium (I’m 5’8”). Good purchase

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fuzzy, big hit at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fuzzy, big hit at Christmas :) Junior sizing and a little short, I ordered a size up. I'm 5'5", 130lb and ordered a medium.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty. Decent material. Ran a little big on me. I am usually size 4 but getting a small was loose.

customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. For my daughter & the smiles upon opening said it all. The fit is good although maybe a bit longer then expected but perfect for leggings!

customer_reviews.title: It is thick and comfortable, Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Surpriseeeeee, quality is beyond my expectation, It is thick and comfortable, Love the color, sleeve reaching my palm which is the length I like, it is slightly longer than normal sweater coving mid of my hip, my favorite part is the neck, it could be wore as turtleneck outdoor which keep me warm. I am glad I brought this lovely sweater for Christmas, totally recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a medium and it fits great in the bust/shoulder region
customer_reviews.text: The fit was OK, I ordered a medium and it fits great in the bust/shoulder region. It is however a little short- it hits just above my jeans line. I was hoping for a little longer of a sweater.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
